Review Title: I love ordering from fashion nova
Review Text: I love ordering from fashion nova. The clothes are good quality as long as you read your reviews on the items so you are picking the right sizes you should be comfortable and happy, I even got my BF putting in his orders lol.

Review Title: Top tier content for fashion nova
Review Text: Always amazing clothes and the fast shipping is really good but let’s talk about the CLOTHES omggggg the stretchy fabrics I loveeee .  If you need a quick and easy fit fashion nova is the store for you I’m an international customer trust me fashion nova will never disappoint.. love them so much

Review Title: Prices and quality of products are…
Review Text: Prices and quality of products are GREAT Would love to see a cash refund if I have to return an unused item. Bought extra items since I forget to add expedited shipping, sent an email to change shipping method and I would pay extra but no response so I ended up with double items. Other than that great job.

Review Title: Great customer service
Review Text: Great customer service. I was helped until the Fashion Nova was able to provide a solution to my problem. I appreciate what they did for me. I love their products and I’m a very happy customer who will continue to support and buy from this brand!!!!

Review Title: False advertising
Review Text: Disappointing experience. You don’t live up to your advertising! BOGO should be applied to all items being purchased. If more than 2 items are part of purchase then BOGO should continue to be applied to whole purchase and all items! The advertising is false and not true. I did not read anywhere that BOGO is only to be applied once during purchase. The company is being shady!!!

Review Title: Love the sales
Review Text: Love the sales, and huge discounts. The variety and quality wins me over every time. Lastly, the ease of returning items if I'm not satisfied gives me confidence when purchasing online.

Review Title: Fashion Nova is my go to
Review Text: I like how often Fashion Nova clothes go on sale and how steep the price cuts are. The additional incentive coupons always keep me coming back.

Review Title: Fashion Nova never disappoints
Review Text: They always have great sales. Quality of their clothes are amazing, never disappointed. My whole wardrobe is Fashion Nova

Review Title: Easy to navigate site wonderful prices…
Review Text: Easy to navigate site wonderful prices can’t wait to see first purchase

Review Title: Delivery is ALWAYS late!
Review Text: I love the items, but my only issue is that for the past 3 or 4 times I have ordered from you all, my package has arrived 2-3 days AFTER the original delivery time & that's always disappointing.

Review Title: Amazing fashion looks
Review Text: Good quality Fast shippingAmazing specials Love bogo deals

Review Title: I placed an order on 8/10/24and it’s…
Review Text: I placed an order on 8/10/24and it’s 8/22/24 and still haven’t received my order. Reached out to fashion nova and the only thing they did was refund my shipping fee. They didn’t go above and beyond and file a claim with ups to investigate my package. Had to reorder the items and pay 1 day shipping to make sure I receive my package on time. At this point they should refund me my 1st order.

Review Title: Good quality and speedy delivery...
Review Text: I've been shopping with FN quite sometime and I haven't been disappointed thus far, thank God! The quality is good and shipping is quite fast. I would definitely recommend.

Review Title: I loved the payment options and the…
Review Text: I loved the payment options and the ease of the application. Experience was simple.

Review Title: The choices and prices are amazing
Review Text: The choices and prices are amazing. What I don't like is i can wear between 2 sizes in their clothes. Sometimes a large fits well, sometimes a medium fits well. there is not rhyme or reason. They do not except returns on sales. I will not offer a store credit. So I lose out. I do not order from them as I prefer to because of that.

Review Title: Please try to rush my order by Saturday…
Review Text: Please try to rush my order by Saturday I appreciate it thank you

Review Title: Fashion Nova always has the best deals…
Review Text: Fashion Nova always has the best deals for fashion and for delivery.

Review Title: I ordered clothes August the 9th they…
Review Text: I ordered clothes August the 9th they said they would be delivered on the 14th then the 16th. Today is the 20th & I still haven’t received my order. I sent 3 emails & contacted support and still no response! I’m highly upset & will never order again. I will be submitting a fraud claim against fashion nova in the morning!

Review Title: My favorite place to buy online…
Review Text: My favorite place to buy online clothing. Great quality and great prices!

Review Title: I wish I could give a zero
Review Text: I wish I could give a zero.   This company is a fraud.   I was provided a discount code upon signing up with  my email.   Initially, the code registered but once my payment proceeded it magically disappeared.   FashionNova refused to stop the order or apply my discount code.   I’ll never shop here again .   There’s better brands with better clothes with friendly prices for working families providing their children,    A big rip off for poor quality fabric clothes.

Review Title: Great deals

Review Title: My order was canceled

Review Title: Second Order due to Failed Shipment
Review Text: This is my second order for these items, as the first is now arriving two days after my trip rather than overnight like I paid for.  I am also unable to reach anyone at FN to help.

Review Title: It’s difficult to browse when every 2…
Review Text: It’s difficult to browse when every 2 seconds a pop-up comes on saying add item to cart. Just because I viewed it doesn’t mean I want it. That’s the main reason I haven’t been on the site, and haven’t purchased in a long time. I really need those particular jeans that’s the ONLY reason I came back to the site. Get rid of the forced pop-up and I’m sure I’d be on the site more.

And tried get in touch with customer service no luck.But Fashion Nova have beautiful quality clothing I will definitely be placing order in near future.

Review Title: Fashion Nova is disgusting and customer…
Review Text: Fashion Nova is disgusting and customer service diabolical. They sent me used smelly garment and didn't want to take accountability for it to send me a return label and I disputed it with my bank. They stated that all their garments come wrinkled in a plastic bag but this garment not only was it looking like someone mopped the floor with it it also smelled in the crotch. I would never do business with them ever again. Especially knowing that they are overpriced Rainbow and I could do better on Shien.

Review Title: Easy to find what im looking for and…
Review Text: Easy to find what im looking for and everything is pretty quick to the point. I also like how it tells you if something runs a little big or small. The only flaw I experience is the confusing sizing chart. For example it will show the measurements of sizes XL and 1X. But you can only select XL there is no 1X so should I refer to 1X for the measurements or XL.

Review Title: Fashion Nova had a $1.00 sale
Review Text: Fashion Nova had a $1.00 sale, I purchase nine items on February 26, 2024 that was $21.90. I purchased an additional eighteen items February 27, 2024 that totalled $36.82 and fifteen items on February 28, 2024 that totalled $30.85. They sent me an email on advising my package was delivered on March 30, 2024 at 1:36 am. I went to look for the package, nothing was delivered.  I sent an email and they advised that they would resend it. I also received an email on April 1, 2024 advising that the next two packages was placed together in one box and was delivered. Again, nothing was delivered, I even checked my porch cameras. I sent and email and they advised that they would resent it. I got fed up of waiting and advised them to refund my money after they stated that both boxes were resent twice. Here we are on August 14, 2024 still no refund but a generic email advising that sorry for the delay and it will take 15 to 21 business days to be refunded. I just want my money back and will never shop at Fashion Nova again.

Review Title: Downhill….Returning items and getting a  refund…
Review Text: The sizing has never been this bad, they false advertise! Buy one get one free is a lie, they raise the prices, so you’re paying for both items! Returning items and getting a  refund is almost non existing! Only store credit to get more damaged items or wrong size!

Review Title: Terrible Experience with Defective Items and Unhelpful Customer Service
Review Text: I recently ordered from Fashion Nova and received defective items. Despite contacting customer service multiple times over two months, they showed zero willingness to help. The customer service is terrible, and the quality of the items is extremely poor, resembling low-quality Chinese products.I hope the €69 I spent was worth it for Fashion Nova. It seems they need it more than I do. I am extremely dissatisfied and will not be ordering from them again. Save yourself the trouble and shop elsewhere.

Review Title: Dishonest and Worst Customer Service
Review Text: I received a wrong item on my last order. Instead of them resending the right item, they offered a refund to my account and when I re-ordered the item it was twice the price of the original item and also was charging shipping again. They said that they didn't have the item in stock when contacted but I checked and found it was still available. Very dishonest Business.

Review Title: Getting tired of promises not working.
Review Text: If something in my basket sells out while I'm shopping, I'd like to know about it.Also, I was going to buy $112.00 of merchandise because it warranted 1 day shipping free, but there was neither a code nor an automatic placement of said free shipping, so I cut a few things out because why spend the extra money if it's going to take 7 days to get here? I don't want to reward a system that won't keep it's promises to customers.

Review Title: I used to love them!
Review Text: I used to love and shop with them all the time. The quality of the clothing was always pretty good with great prices to match. Lately, that has not been the case. The clothes are now made with extremely cheap material and terrible stitch work. The clothes are starting to resemble those from SHEIN. I have been becoming increasingly disappointed with the product coming from Fashion Nova. I think I’m done with the site all together 😪To add insult to injury, they’re now giving refunds in the form of credits to their store only. They used to refund your money back
